Package com.example.freeturilo.connection

Class APIActivityHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.freeturilo.connection.APIActivityHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    APIHandler
    public class APIActivityHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements APIHandler
    A handler for errors in Freeturilo API transactions compatible with activities.

    Object of this class handles errors occurring in Freeturilo API transactions that have been performed with the use of an activity.

    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Miko≈Çaj Terzyk
    See Also:
    activity, finishActivity, handle(com.example.freeturilo.connection.APIException), APIHandler, APIException, APIRunnable, Activity

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private android.app.Activity activity
      Stores the activity which has been used to perform the transaction.
      private boolean finishActivity
      Stores the flag defining whether to finish the activity after handling an error.

    • Constructor Detail

      • APIActivityHandler

        public APIActivityHandler​(android.app.Activity activity,
                          boolean finishActivity)
        Class constructor.
        Parameters:
        activity - an activity which typically is the activity which has been used to perform the transaction
        finishActivity - a boolean defining whether to finish the activity after handling the error

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        public void handle​(APIException error)
        Handles an error in a Freeturilo API transaction. Displays an ErrorActivity customized for the APIException. Then finishes the activity if finishActivity is set to true.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface APIHandler
        Parameters:
        error - an error that occurred in an API transaction
        See Also:
        activity, finishActivity, ErrorActivity, ErrorType, APIException
